title: Relaxing resort-style heated spa, Polished quartz countertops
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1170 Sq.
Ft.

Thoughtfully designed floor plans, sleek modern finishes, and smart home technology come together to create a blue print for effortless living within the center of a vibrant new village in Kirkland, WA.
Welcome home to our spacious studio, one, and two bedroom apartments at North Totem Lake.
Features:

Private balcony, Kitchen island with pendant lighting, USB charging outlets, Polished quartz countertops, Keyless front door entry, Elevator access, Wood-style plank flooring, Stainless steel appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator with icemaker, gas range, and dishwasher, In-home washer and dryer, Oversized walk-in closets, Air conditioning with smart programmable thermostat
Community Amenities:

Easy access to I-405 at 120th Avenue, Fenced dog park with pet watering station, Co-working lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi, Dog wash and self-service grooming area, Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen, golf simulator, game room and billiards table, Gated multi-level parking garage, Minutes from the Totem Lake Transit Center, Hub by Amazon: package lockers with 24/7 access to packages, State-of-the-art fitness center, Controlled-access bike storage and bike repair room, Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply), Relaxing resort-style heated spa, Virtual moving concierge, Electric car charging stations, Share the air: smoke-free community, Outdoor gear storage
Pet Policy
Please visit our website for more information.
